headline: BMO Capital Maintains ‘Outperform’ Rating on The Mosaic Company (MOS); Raises PT
summary: The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) is one of the 7 best fertilizer stocks to buy according to hedge funds. BMO Capital announced its decision to raise its price target on The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) from $44 to $48 on June 18, 2025. By maintaining an ‘Outperform’ rating, the analyst expressed optimism about the company’s cost-cutting initiatives, […]

headline: Mosaic (MOS) Revises Outlook and Sees Stock Dip Followed by Recovery
summary: The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) is one of the 10 cheap Jim Cramer stocks to invest in. On June 6, the company updated its second-quarter and 2025 guidance. Phosphate pricing for the second quarter has been raised. Additionally, second quarter phosphate sales volumes are now expected to range from 1.5 to 1.6 million tonnes, down from […]
